sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import {
  Box,
  Button,
  VStack,
  Heading,
  Text,
  Container,
  Icon,
  Flex,
  Badge,
} from '@chakra-ui/react';
import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom';
import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext';
import { FiShield, FiLock } from 'react-icons/fi';

const Login = () => {
  const { login } = useAuth();
  const navigate = useNavigate();

  const handleLogin = () => {
    login();
    navigate('/');
  };

  return (
    <Box
      minH="100vh"
      bgGradient="linear-gradient(to bottom right, #1a1c2a, #151725)"
      position="relative"
      overflow="hidden"
    >
      <Box
        position="absolute"
        top="0"
        left="0"
        right="0"
        bottom="0"
        bgGradient="radial-gradient(circle at top right, rgba(149, 128, 255, 0.2), transparent 60%)"
      />
      <Container maxW="container.sm" py={20}>
        <VStack spacing={8}>
          <Badge
            colorScheme="purple"
            p={2}
            px={4}
            borderRadius="full"
            textTransform="uppercase"
            letterSpacing="wider"
            fontSize="sm"
            bgGradient="linear-gradient(45deg, #9580FF50, #80FFEA50)"
            border="1px solid"
            borderColor="whiteAlpha.200"
          >
            Next-Gen Security Platform
          </Badge>
          
          <Box
            p={10}
            borderRadius="2xl"
            bg="rgba(26, 28, 42, 0.7)"
            borderWidth="1px"
            borderColor="rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1)"
            boxShadow="0 0 20px rgba(149, 128, 255, 0.2)"
            backdropFilter="blur(10px)"
            w="full"
          >
            <VStack spacing={8}>
              <Icon as={FiShield} w={16} h={16} color="#9580FF" />
              <VStack spacing={4}>
                <Heading 
                  size="xl" 
                  bgGradient="linear-gradient(45deg, #9580FF, #80FFEA)"
                  bgClip="text"
                >
                  Welcome to ThreatIntel AI
                </Heading>
                <Text color="whiteAlpha.800" textAlign="center" fontSize="lg">
                  Your comprehensive cybersecurity threat intelligence platform
                </Text>
              </VStack>

              <Button
                size="lg"
                width="full"
                height="60px"
                bgGradient="linear-gradient(45deg, #9580FF, #80FFEA)"
                color="white"
                _hover={{
                  bgGradient: "linear-gradient(45deg, #8070EF, #70EFDA)",
                  transform: "translateY(-2px)",
                  boxShadow: "0 0 20px rgba(149, 128, 255, 0.4)",
                }}
                _active={{
                  transform: "translateY(0)",
                }}
                leftIcon={<Icon as={FiLock} />}
                onClick={handleLogin}
              >
                Enter Secure Dashboard
              </Button>

              <Text color="whiteAlpha.600" fontSize="sm">
                Protected by advanced AI-powered security
              </Text>
            </VStack>
          </Box>
        </VStack>
      </Container>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default Login;
